Articles.Content:
If you\'re up for it...

The Jeb KerBoom Ultimate Orbital Close Pass Challenge!

THE RULES:

Only two launches allowed

You can use any mods you want, even MechJeb

The closest person to the other ship by June 1st WINS! The prize is a free, super-cool, always-works Mun Shot rocket, with MechJeb installed!

YOU MUST POST A PICTURE! Otherwise, you won\'t count.

I hope you enjoy the challenge! Good luck, my future orbital rendezvous specialist!

The grand prize... The OldWood MechJeb

Applications begin now! I accidentaly forgot ( :-[ ) to say that you have to announce that you are doing the challenge, but for the Kerbals who have already taken off, I will let you go. :

The prize spacecraft comes with parts. 8)

[glow=red,2,300]Happy flying![/glow]

[move]Remember: Ends June 1, and photograph at nearest approach is required![/move]

Is this the kind of thing you\'re going for?

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=10570.0
That\'s almost exactly my challenge! I can\'t believe that someone had the same idea ???!
